name: Mecha Mountain Goat Ranger Force Charge!
name_original: Mecha Mountain Goat Ranger Force Charge!
description:
Deep in a peaceful mountain region, the evil Termitrix and her Termitrons are up to no good!

The Mecha Mountain Goat Ranger Force is on the way! 

5 Giant goat mechs are here to stop them, each with their own powers to fight their foes.

Yellow: Speed and Agility

Green: An Invincible Shield

Blue: A powerful Tractor Beam

Red: A really big sword

Purple: Their secret weapon...

Can they beat the Termitrons before it's too late?

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021

Programs Used:

Unreal Engine 4.26

Blender 2.93

Bfxr

Additional Credits:

DL Sounds - music tracks 
FreeSound - Various sound effects.
Epic Games- Various starter content
